titleStmt.title: A conference between the Lady Jane Grey and F. Fecknam a Romish priest, concerning the blessed sacrament; whilest she was prisoner in the Tower of London, and was beheaded on the Green there, Feb. 12. 1554. Together with her behaviour and last speech and prayers at her suffering.
titleStmt.author: Grey, Jane, Lady, 1537-1554.
Feckenham, John de, 1518?-1585.
